name: WebMan Templates
author: WebMan Design, Oliver Juhas

sections.description:
This plugin provides a collection of custom Beaver Builder page builder templates for WordPress themes (especially the accessibility ready themes by WebMan Design).

The plugin only serves additional custom templates to Beaver Builder page builder interface, so it is not slowing down your website at all.

Features

  • Basic collection of pre-designed row templates (under “Predesigned Rows” section)
  • Adds additional collections for supported themes (see WebMan Design themes for more info)

Additional Resources

  • Have a question?
  • Grab a free theme
  • Follow @webmandesigneu
  • WebMan Design website
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the plugin download file and upload webman-templates folder into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Now, whenever you edit a page or post with Beaver Builder (you need to have the plugin installed and activated), the page builder interface will contain additional sections of pre-designed rows.
sections.faq:
It does not do anything, how come?

Please note that this is an extension plugin for Beaver Builder page builder. You need to have Beaver Builder page builder (either its free or paid version) installed and active first.

Can I set it up somehow?

This is a simple plugin that only adds custom collections of designs into Beaver Builder page builder and there is really no need for any settings page.

If you want, you can modify the plugin with code using action and filter hooks provided.
sections.changelog: Please see the changelog.md file for details.

short_description: Collection of pre-designed row templates for Beaver Builder page builder.
